description.en: GHST is the eco-governance token of Aavegotchi. Use GHST to purchase various digital assets within the Aavegotchi universe, such as Aavegotchi portals & wearables. Hold GHST so your Aavegotchi can participate in DAO governance, and earn GHST by excelling at Aavegotchi rarity farming.
